bibl.title: Military Officers as Landowners in Fourth Century Egypt.
bibl.note: À propos de: Jean-Michel CARRIÉ, Patronage et propriété militaires au IVe s. Objet rhétorique et objet réel du discours Sur les patronages de Libanius, BCH 100 (1976) pp. 159-176. - 1. Flavius Vitalianus. - 2. Fl. Abinnaeus. - 3. Numbers. - "It is difficult to say whether active military officers owned more land in Egypt in the fourth century than they had in earlier periods or not."
bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S., Military Officers as Landowners in Fourth Century Egypt.
